Detailed Description

A CheckBoxControl represents a checkbox, which may be selected or unselected. In contrast to a radiobutton-control, checkboxes are independant from other checkboxes per definition.

void CheckBoxControl::SetSelected (  BOOLEAN  selected  )  [inline]

void CheckBoxControl::SetValue (  INT  value  )  [inline]
 

A checkbox may represent a value, which can be specified.

void CheckBoxControl::Toggle (   ) 
 

Toggles the selected property: if the checkbox is selected it will get unselected, if the selection is unselected it will get selected.
